item.title: 贸易战中德国商业银行拨备增幅低于预期
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）第一季度利润意外增长，原因是这家德国贷款机构在贸易战中为变质贷款预留的资金少于预期。【原文：Commerzbank AG’s first-quarter profit unexpectedly rose as the German lender set aside less money than expected for souring loans amid the trade war.】

item.title: 肯尼亚 Safaricom 公司利润增长 11%，超出预期
item.description: Safaricom Plc 表示，截至 3 月的年度利润增长了 11%，超出了分析师的预期。【原文：Safaricom Plc said annual profit rose 11% for the year ended March, exceeding analysts’ expectations.】

item.title: 随着旅游业的蓬勃发展，日本顶级酒店因可能存在价格串通而受到审查
item.description: 日本反垄断监督机构在一份警告中称，包括东京历史悠久的帝国酒店和新大谷酒店在内的一批日本顶级酒店一直在共享房价信息，这可能违反了反垄断规则。【原文：A group of Japan’s top hotels, including Tokyo’s historic Imperial Hotel and New Otani, have been sharing rates information in a potential breach of anti-monopoly rules, the country’s antitrust watchdog said in a warning.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 IHC 和贝莱德推出价值 10 亿美元的再保险公司
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的上市公司阿布扎比国际控股公司（International Holding Co.【原文：International Holding Co., Abu Dhabi’s largest listed company led by a key member of the emirate’s royal family, is launching a $1 billion reinsurance venture with BlackRock Inc.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称：借贷成本下降，香港房地产或触底反弹
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）认为，香港利率的下降增加了住宅房地产市场触底反弹的可能性。【原文：Declining interest rates in Hong Kong are increasing the chances the residential property market bottoms out, according to Jefferies.】

item.title: 北欧领导人与特朗普、泽连斯基谈论停火前景
item.description: 北欧、波罗的海和荷兰政府领导人与唐纳德-特朗普和沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基就乌克兰停火前景举行了会谈。【原文：The Nordic, Baltic and Dutch government leaders have held talks with Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelenskiy about the prospects of a cease fire in Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国顶级芯片制造商中芯国际预计销售额下降后暴跌
item.description: 周五，中国领先的芯片制造商中芯国际集成电路制造有限公司（Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp.【原文：Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp. plunged Friday after China’s leading chipmaker warned sales could fall as much as 6% this quarter because of production disruptions.】

item.title: 印度中央银行准备在卢比下滑时稳定其汇率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行预计卢比不会大幅波动，但准备动用外汇储备来维护货币稳定，因为与巴基斯坦的紧张局势正在升级。【原文：India’s central bank doesn’t expect wild swings in the rupee but is ready to use foreign reserves to preserve currency stability as tensions with Pakistan escalate, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: NTT 宣布回购 2,000 亿日元，改变资本战略
item.description: 日本电信电话公司（Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp.）表示，该公司计划回购多达 2,000 亿日元（14 亿美元）的自有股票，加入了越来越多的此类支持日本市场措施的行列。【原文：Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp. said it plans to buy back as much as ¥200 billion ($1.4 billion) of its own shares, joining a growing string of such measures bolstering the Japanese market.】

item.title: 中美谈判前投资者转向谨慎，中国股市下滑
item.description: 中国股市走低，原因是在全球最大的两个经济体于周末举行贸易谈判之前，市场普遍持谨慎态度。【原文：Chinese shares edged lower as caution prevailed ahead of the closely watched weekend trade talks between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 私人信贷投资者在关税担忧中调整投资组合
item.description: 随着全球关税战的升级，私人信贷投资者正寻求重新调整其投资组合，因为他们越来越担心对美国的投资配置。【原文：Private credit investors are seeking to reshuffle their portfolios as the escalating global tariff war prompts mounting fears over allocations into the US.】

item.title: 中国茶壶购买罕见的穆尔班油，以便快速交货
item.description: 至少有两家独立的中国炼油厂罕见地涉足了更广泛的国际原油市场，抢购了一批将于下月交货的中东石油。【原文：At least two independent Chinese refiners have made a rare foray into the broader international crude market, snapping up cargoes of Middle Eastern oil for delivery next month.】

item.title: 财富管理公司以 60% 的收入分成吸引印度银行家
item.description: 印度一家市值 60 亿美元的基金管理公司计划加大对高级银行家的招聘力度，允许他们保留最多 60% 的收入，这表明在全球增长最快的财富市场之一，人才竞争正在白热化。【原文：A $6 billion Indian money manager plans to ramp up hiring of senior bankers by allowing them to keep up to 60% of the revenue they bring in, showing how competition for talent is heating up in one of the world’s fastest growing wealth markets.】

item.title: 中国对美出口下滑 21%，但对亚洲其他地区和欧洲的出口飙升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收超过 100% 的关税后的第一个月，中国的出口增长甚至出现了大幅下滑。【原文：China’s export growth rose even as shipments to the US slumped sharply in the first month after President Donald Trump hit its goods with tariffs above 100%, a boost for a domestic economy that’s been increasingly reliant on foreign demand.】

item.title: 在 OpenAI 大会上，Fidji Simo 将带来 Instacart 和 Meta 的经验教训
item.description: 在 OpenAI 担任新的领导职务后，Fidji Simo 将把她在建立客户忠诚度 — 和处理内部矛盾方面所学到的一切知识付诸实践。【原文：With her new leadership role at OpenAI, Fidji Simo will be expected to bring to bear everything she’s learned about building customer loyalty — and navigating internal drama.】

item.title: 普洛斯物流公司新债券融资3亿美元，但报告亏损
item.description: 亚洲物流地产开发商普洛斯私人有限公司（GLP Pte.）出售了一笔3亿美元的三年期债券，这是该公司在最近取消出售债券后重返债市，因为它面临着一笔10亿美元的到期票据。【原文：Asian logistics property developer GLP Pte. has sold a three-year $300 million bond, returning to the debt market after a recent canceled sale as it faces a $1 billion note coming due.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦冲突升级，印度航空运营商股票承压
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 产量激增，印尼力争今年停止大米进口
item.description: 印度尼西亚是世界上最大的主食种植国之一，由于大米产量和库存激增，印度尼西亚今年将数十年来首次停止进口大米。【原文：Indonesia is set to stop importing rice this year for the first time in decades, thanks to surging production and stockpiles in one of the world’s top growers of the staple food.】

item.title: 日本央行加息的长期博弈将继续支撑日本大型银行的发展
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.）、瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.）和三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.）将详细说明，在美国关税引发的不确定性中，日本央行提高借贷成本的承诺对利润率的帮助有多大。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc., Mizuho Financial Group Inc. and Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. will detail how much the Bank of Japan’s commitment to raise borrowing costs could help profit margins in the midst of uncertainty sparked by US tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普团队在对华谈判中寻求关税削减和稀土减免
item.description: 特朗普政府正准备在周末与中国举行会谈，考虑可能大幅降低关税，以缓和紧张局势，双方将从上个月设定的过高关税水平上削减关税，以缓和双方已经开始感受到的经济痛苦。【原文：The Trump administration is heading into weekend talks with China contemplating a potentially dramatic tariff reduction in a de-escalatory move that would see both sides slash duties from prohibitive levels set last month to temper the economic pain both are already starting to feel.】

item.title: 绕过美元的全球转变正在亚洲形成势头
item.description: 银行和经纪商对绕过美元的货币衍生品的需求不断上升，因为贸易紧张局势为多年来远离美元的转变增添了紧迫感。【原文：Banks and brokers are seeing rising demand for currency derivatives that bypass the dollar, as trade tensions add a sense of urgency to a years-long shift away from the greenback.】

item.title: 泰国亿万富豪的 Frasers 地产公司因新加坡住房业务利润增加
item.description: 泰国亿万富翁 Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi 控制的开发商 Frasers Property Ltd. 公布上半年利润增长，原因是其新加坡住宅业务弥补了澳大利亚和中国市场的下滑，以及利息支出的增加。【原文：Frasers Property Ltd., the developer controlled by Thai billionaire Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi, reported higher first-half profit as its Singapore residential business made up for a slump in Australia and China, along with higher interest payments.】

item.title: 美国关税打击企业，日本四月早期出口放缓
item.description: 由于美国加强了对新车和全面征税的关税行动，日本的出口在 4 月份的前 20 天中有所放缓。【原文：Japan’s exports slowed in the first 20 days of April as the US tariff campaign intensified with new car and across-the-board levies.】

item.title: CoStar 同意以 19.2 亿美元收购房地产门户域名
item.description: Domain 在一份声明中表示，CoStar 集团公司已达成一项具有约束力的交易，将以每股 4.43 澳元的价格收购澳大利亚 Domain 控股公司，该公司的估值为 30 亿澳元（约合 19.2 亿美元）。【原文：CoStar Group Inc. has entered a binding deal to buy Domain Holdings Australia for A$4.43 per share, valuing the company at A$3 billion ($1.92 billion), Domain said in a statement.】

item.title: 牧野铣削股价因收购退出而下跌
item.description: 日本电产株式会社（Nidec Corp.）撤回对这家日本机床制造商的主动收购要约后，牧野铣床公司（Makino Milling Machine Co.【原文：Shares of Makino Milling Machine Co. tumbled as much as 21% on Friday, the most on record, after Nidec Corp. withdrew its unsolicited takeover bid for the Japanese machine tool maker.】

item.title: 卢特尼克警告韩国、日本的交易比英国更复杂
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，与韩国和日本的贸易协议可能需要比唐纳德-特朗普总统周四宣布的与英国的框架协议更长的时间才能完成，这表明一些亚洲伙伴可能需要等待关税减免。【原文：Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said that trade deals with South Korea and Japan could take significantly more time to complete than the framework agreement President Donald Trump announced Thursday with the UK, in a signal that some Asian partners may have to wait for tariff relief.】

item.title: 市场权衡英美协议影响，黄金走高
item.description: 由于市场消化了新的美英贸易协议，黄金走高。在此之前的一周里，黄金在前两个交易日跳涨了近 6%，随后又回吐了大部分涨幅。【原文：Gold edged higher — after a roller-coaster week in which it jumped almost 6% in the first two sessions before retracing much of those gains — as the market digested the new US-UK trade deal.】

item.title: 日本工资增长放缓，支持日本央行谨慎行事
item.description: 日本 3 月份的名义工资增长放缓幅度超过预期，这进一步表明，在国内外经济风险继续增加的情况下，日本央行有理由谨慎加息。【原文：Growth in Japan’s nominal wages slowed more than expected in March, adding to the case for the Bank of Japan to proceed cautiously with interest-rate hikes as economic risks at home and abroad continue to mount.】
